quizlist.question: What are you looking to achieve with your skin care?
What is your skin type?
quizlist.option2: Normal (not many issues, keep skins regular)
quizlist.option3: Dry (redness, dull skin, need to use a lot of moisturizer)
quizlist.option4: Combo (oily on forehead, nose, and chin, cheeks seem dry)

quizlist.question: How much time would you like to spend on your routine?
Are you using Retinol, Renti-A, Accutane?
What products are you currently using?
quizlist.option2: cleanser, toner, eye cream, serum, lotion, SPF
